title: Globe Electric 61063 1-Light Pendant Light, Rattan Shade, Black Socket, Black Fabric Hanging Cord, Home DÃ©cor Lighting, Adjustable Height, Light Fixture Ceiling Hanging, Pendant Light Fixture
features: HYGGE: classically the Hygge style, the Trancoso pendant light encompasses simple design mixed with natural fibers to epitomize the serene feeling of a comfortable atmosphere that encourages you to enjoy your home as much as the great outdoors
MODERN RATTAN SHADE: the modern styling of this rattan shade is accented by a black canopy and black hanging cord to offer a warm glow for any room in your home
BULB REQUIREMENTS: 1x E26 Medium Base 60W Bulb (sold separately)

MAKE IT SMART: automate your pendant light by adding a Globe Electric Smart bulb - simply screw it in and create different lighting solutions with your phone - set it to come on at dusk, change the color for each season, make it bright white for the morning or warm white for the evening - the options are endless
EASY INSTALL: includes all mounting hardware for quick and easy installation - Maximum Hanging Height: 69.63-inches; Minimum Hanging Height: 15-inches. Switch Style : Wall Light Switch
description: By utilizing natural fibers and a simple but refined style, the Novogratz and Globe Electric have created a serene light that sits in the pocket of the Hygge mind frame. The Trancoso Pendant Light is an art in creating intimacy with it's natural rattan shade and black hanging cord. The unique shape modernizes the whole design and would look amazing in your kitchen, living room or lanai. Novogratz and Globe Electric - lighting made easy.
